== Purpose ==

Discuss the actions needed to accomodate LAM aspets in the future OOPS design.

== Contact ==

 Please contact Ulf.Andrae@smhi.se and Jelena.Bojarova@met.no for any questions.

== Participation, period and location ==

The working meeting starts at 1400 on Tuesday, Mar 13, at SMHI, Rossbyrummet, finishes at 1200 on Wednesday, 14 Mar 2012 

Participates are,
 * SMHI: Ulf Andrae, Nils Gustafsson, Magnus Lindskog, Åke Johansson, Tomas Landelius
 * met.no: Jelena Bojarova, Trygve Aspelien

 * ECMWF: Tomas Wilhelmsson
 * RMI: Piet Termomnia
 * RHMS: Roger Randriamampianina

== Accomodation ==

 A block booking is done on [http://www.kneippen.se/eng/eng.htm Hotell Kneippen]. Booking code: HIRLAM, email:hotel@kneippen.se. 650 SEK, breakfast included. Please confirm your room directly to the hotel with your arrival/departure before March 1st.
